parsed_email.subject: Cash to Master request - MV Atlantic Star
parsed_email.body_text:
Dear Port Agent,

Please arrange cash advance for Master of MV Atlantic Star.

Amount: USD 5,000
Purpose: Crew wages and sundry expenses
Port: Hamburg
Arrival: 22-Jan-2024

Please confirm cash availability and collection procedure.
Master will provide signed receipt upon collection.

Regards,
Captain James Anderson
MV Atlantic Star

classification.summary: Request for a cash advance of USD 5,000 for crew wages and sundry expenses for the MV Atlantic Star arriving in Hamburg on January 22, 2024.
